RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 85. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 17700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $7,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 5 Allowe d 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT DAME saved ground with the lead to the half, shut off mid stretch, recovered to fight back to the wire with stout handling. MEMPHIS CASH QUEEN between horses to far turn, ran past leader stretch, run down. OFF THE CHARTS unhurried to the half, came on mildly for the show spot. FORGLO tracked leaders from off rail to far turn, faded in the stretch. E STREET ANGEL reared at the start, lost best chance with a steady fade.

ENTRY.NAME: E Street Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared at the start, lost best chance with a steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Dame
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground with to half, shut off stretch came back on

ENTRY.NAME: Off the Charts
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the half, came on mildly for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Memphis Cash Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to far turn, ran past leader stretch, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Forglo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders from off rail to far turn, faded in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 17900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 5, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500 In Last 5 Starts)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this racew ill be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KICK OUT THE JAMS no speed to far turn, came widest with a late kick to be along in time at the wire. BACKYARD HEN lagged along off rail to far turn, kicked in stretch run, cleared but nailed on the wire in a good effort. SUPER LUCY off rail to stretch, angled out split horses in the lane run for show spot. SEAWARD three wide never far back to far turn but came up empty in the stretch run. TALK RADIO sprinted from outside to the front, stayed to far turn, but faltered in the stretch run. ADDISON never a real menace throughout while between horses in the stretch. LIVE IT UP dueled from two path to the half but weakened between horses stretch. CONNECTTHECAUSEWAY tried to keep up to far turn but gave in readily through the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Live It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path to the half, weakened between horses stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Connectthecauseway
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to far turn, gave in readily in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Super Lucy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail to stretch angled out split horses stretch run for show

ENTRY.NAME: Addison
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a real menace throughout while between horses stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Seaward
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide never far back to far turn empty in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Backyard Hen
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged along off rail to far turn, kicked in stretch run, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Kick Out the Jams
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, came widest with a late kick, along at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Radio
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted from outside to the front, stayed to far turn, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Claiming Purse 16900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OHIO LADY tracked leaders to the half, took over to go clear much the best in handy fashion to the wire. SISSY'S MAY broke tard never far back throughout rushed far turn second best. SHEZ IN A TIZZY swooped to the lead at the half, weakened from quarter pole. SHOW KITTEN never a factor while evenly throughout. SUPER SCAMP off rail run to the front, dueled to the half, dropped far back. INCREDIBLE MARINI through early, stopped and dropped far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders to the half, took over to go clear much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Sissy's May
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tard never far back throughout rushed far turn second best

ENTRY.NAME: Super Scamp
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to the front, dueled to the half, dropped far back

ENTRY.NAME: Incredible Marini
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, sx, dropped far back

ENTRY.NAME: Show Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a factor while evenly throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Shez in a Tizzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: swooped to the lead at the half, weakened from quarter pole

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLATTER ME ZEN tracked top pair to the turn, came three wide run to front in to the stretch and cleared off as tons the best while ridden out to the wire. SLY WINK inside run to quarter pole, kept on in the stretch for place. SHADY DAISY went up inside to the turn, could not go on settled for show spot. CREATIVE WHIT sprinted away to the front. headed into stretch backed up late. KENDALL SPIRIT never close throughout. TRANQUIL TIMES tried to keep up early on, gave way reaily out of the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Daisy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Tribbett Robert L and Bechtel Glenn
ENTRY.COMMENT: went up inside to the turn, could not go on settled for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Sly Wink
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to quarter pole, kept on in the stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: Kendall Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Blackleaf Farms LLC and Davis Raymond L
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Creative Whit
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away to the front. headed into stretch backed up late

ENTRY.NAME: Tranquil Times
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up early on, gave way reaily out of the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Flatter Me Zen
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked top pair to the turn, three wide run to front ridden out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 5, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowe d 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HPNOTIQ RHYTHM just off pace to far turn, rallied between horses, dug in to edge clear. HIGH POWERED good position never far back to far turn, prolonged run for place. BAKER'S MAN unhurried to far turn, rallied along in stretch for show spot. BIG BOSS MAN three wide run first turn, kept on backstretch, short lead, empty. DUDLEY inside speed to the front, stopped at the half, backed up readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Baker's Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn, rallied along in stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Dudley
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, stopped at the half, backed up readily

ENTRY.NAME: Hpnotiq Rhythm
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace to far turn, rallied between horses dug in, clear

ENTRY.NAME: High Powered
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back quarter pole prolonged run for place

ENTRY.NAME: Big Boss Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide run first turn, kept on backstretch, short lead, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEBRIDES lagged back to far turn, kicked into gear into stretch ran away in impressive fashion. GRACIE'S KITTEN speed to the front dueled at the half, spurted clear, no match. WITCHING HOUR no speed to far turn, ran on in the stretch for show spot. CAPTIVE STAR raced along evenly from off rail throughout. BIRD SET FREE saved ground throughout to no avail. PARTY NEVER ENDS good position from inside to stretch run, weakened late going. BLOSSOM DIVA pestered leader to the half, stayed to far turn retreated stretch. SOUTHERN MESA brief speed inside, gave way readily to fade far back. JOEZINE raced back to far turn, pulled up in the stretch and subsequently vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Mesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside, gave way readily to fade far back

ENTRY.NAME: Hebrides
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back to far turn, kicked into gear thru stretch ran away

ENTRY.NAME: Bird Set Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie's Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front dueled at the half, spurted clear, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Witching Hour
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, ran on in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Joezine
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to far turn, pulled up in the stretch, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Party Never Ends
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position from inside to stretch run, weakened late going

ENTRY.NAME: Blossom Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: pestered leader to the half, stayed to far turn retreated stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Captive Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from off rail throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 5, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race S ince Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOFTY ADJUDICATOR inside speed, nursed along to the turn, well handled to stay clear to the wire. BIG TRUCK four wide run early on, kept on grinding away, no match late. SAIL AT SUNRISE dueled from two path, stayed to quarter pole, weakened late. KHOZAN'S SUCCESS shuffled back start from between horses while evenly throughout. ELLE'SBIGSEACRET inside trip to no avail. COUNTRY CLUB BOBBY brief speed, gave way readily going into the turn backed up.

ENTRY.NAME: Elle'sbigseacret
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced an inside trip to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Lofty Adjudicator
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, nursed along to the turn, well handled, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Country Club Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, gave way readily going into the turn backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Khozan's Success
ENTRY.OWNER: Lauer Penny S and Gans Bruce D
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back start from between horses while evenly throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Sail At Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path, stayed to quarter pole, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Big Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide run early on, kept on grinding away, no match late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 89. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 5, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Prefer red)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAUGH A LOT squeezed startf, rallied in hand far turn, cleared off in in the stretch in sharp fashion under confident handling to the wire as much the best. P K WOOD unhurried to far turn, split horses to run on through traffic in the late stretch for place spot. TIGER PAW (IRE) chased leader to far turn, could not keep up faded to third in the stretch run. METATRON'S MUSE raced an inside trip to far turn with no late kick when needed in the stretch run. MOONSTRIKE (GB) sat in good position off rail to far turn, ran between horses stretch and tired. HASTY STRIKE unhurried early with a wide run to far turn with no late kick in the stretch. FAST FELIX tried to keep inside into first turn, gave way readily thereafter. DIAL HIM UP never threatened throughput. CROONER speed to the front, led to far turn with nothing left and gave in readily. DESERT HIGHWAY always trailed while far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Him Up
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened throughput

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Highway
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed while far back

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Felix
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up inside to first turn gave way readily thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Metatron's Muse
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Crooner
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, led to far turn with nothing left and gave in

ENTRY.NAME: P K Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn, ran on through traffic stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: Laugh a Lot
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed start, rallied in hand to far turn, cleared off handily

ENTRY.NAME: Moonstrike (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Horan Tom Wells Daniel Preiss Daniel and Haphazard Racing Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position off rail to far turn, between horses stretch tired

ENTRY.NAME: Hasty Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, wide run to far turn with no late run stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Paw (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Iavarone Michael Iavarone Julia C Durando Donald Maller Bruce and Meah Anna M
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn, could not keep up faded to third
